saying: There's an exception to every rule.
description: Olivia is a snooty, cat villager in the Animal Crossing series. Her name, Olivia, may refer to olives because an olive has a hard pit on the inside, and is somewhat bitter on the outside. This means that Olivia is hard and soulful on the inside, but can be bitter and mean on the outside. She has appeared in every game of the Animal Crossing series.
